name: B. AND 0, Sum Big
statement:
Baby Badawy’s first words were "AND 0 SUM BIG", so he decided to solve
the following problem. Given two integers n and k, count the number of
arrays of length n such that: all its elements are integers between 0
and 2^k-1 (inclusive); the bitwise AND of all its elements is 0; the sum
of its elements is as large as possible. Since the answer can be very
large, print its remainder when divided by 10^9+7.
